 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַיָּל‎</span> **noun [masculine]** (**feminine** [[Ps.42.2|Ps 42:2]]) ==hart, stag, deer== (Aramaic ***id.***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhJgAbAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAmABsAAAJnjI+py+0PYwM0VnNtdhRgL3VfBx6iKAUZqZybZb7jl6qlPKMhiM92XXq4gkIih2dk6CCXXiupbEITziiN+qzZSMHlkskd6qqLsHk8LVdWYcT3qN2mjOT3Ln2N//RAMt/t95cnSMhXAAA7">, Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhHwAhAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAAfACEAAAJhjI+pywcPmmTwzRtqxFjzbn3iOHoktRkhiJhZeq1OIk/1cjc5Dds9/tMFFUMKsCW6yYpHXovpJCI/EGJq96s4lkFlpFobek+qLLkM2/G6mrD2JW6zbKXq+fm+w9V1vf9eAAA7">, Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***ailu***</u></abbr> [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>w</sup>, but dubious, see [[BDB#Hpt|Hpt]]<sup>BAS i. 170</sup>; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhKQASAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAAAAAAALAAAAAApABIAAAJjjI+py62AgJRnQpds0NtS42HRBH5kN54id5Jqx2Gseb3eJX9wGcNhhtvxeMFSRTc84lovoS8FTT6PwKCNhlRpKM1qDem8QXpeqdSFHUG7Wi72a709mLFZEdVo3+mivv8P6FcAADs="> = ***leader*** ? compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַיִל‎</span>) Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> = ***ibex*** (i. q. <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎א‎</span> absolute [[Deut.12.15|Deut 12:15]] + 6 t.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אַיָּלִים‎</span> [[Song.2.9|Song 2:9]] + 3 t.; — ***hart, stag***, allowed as food [[Deut.12.15|Deut 12:15]]; [[Deut.12.22|Deut 12:22]]; [[Deut.15.22|Deut 15:22]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְבִי‎</span>); [[Deut.14.5|Deut 14:5]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְבִי‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַחְמוּר‎</span> etc.); eaten in Solomon's household [[1Kgs.5.3|1Kgs 5:3]] (\|\| as [[Deut.14.5|Deut 14:5]]); simile of leaping [[Isa.35.6|Isa 35:6]] id. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֹפֶר הָא‎</span> [[Song.2.9|Song 2:9]]; [[Song.2.17|Song 2:17]]; [[Song.8.14|Song 8:14]] (all \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְבִי‎</span>); as in search of pasture, simile of princes of Judah [[Lam.1.6|Lam 1:6]] as longing for water, simile of longing for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> [[Ps.42.2|Ps 42:2]].
